version_description:
* Find answers to frequently asked questions in Help & Support.
* Get insights on spending, trends, cash flow, and unusual activity for BB&T now 
   Truist clients.
* Zelle® is now available for SunTrust now Truist clients.
* Request a copy of your credit card agreement disclosure.
* Set nicknames for brokerage accounts.
* Aligned trust account balances to trade-date
* Enhanced investment portfolio research navigation and content
* Move money fast with 3D touch.
* Additional bug fixes and enhancements to improve your experience.

* Transfer money to or from external accounts.
* Show, hide, and create nicknames for brokerage accounts.
* Transfer money to or from BB&T now Truist Prepaid and Money Accounts.
* Get a cash advance from your credit card.
* Pay your line of credit.
* Improved wealth and investment experiences
* Additional bug fixes and enhancements

What's New 
     -bug fixes and enhancements to improve your experience.

• Experian® CreditCenter™ is available for Wealth clients.
• Retail clients - get insights and advice on accounts.
• Estimate savings with mortgage payment calculators.
• Business clients - enroll and manage accounts with Fraud Inspector.
• Order a new debit card for eligible deposit accounts.
• View check images associated with a deposit slip.
• Additional bug fixes and enhancements.
